abstract: As the recession hit, the plan was also hurt by a lack of transmission lines and a fall-off in the price of a rival energy source.
snippet: As the recession hit, the plan was also hurt by a lack of transmission lines and a fall-off in the price of a rival energy source.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of the difficulties facing the development of wind energy, the legendary Texas oilman T. Boone Pickens is suspending plans to build the world’s largest wind farm.

headline.main: Pickens Scales Back Ambitious Wind Farm
headline.print_headline: Pickens Scales Back Ambitious Wind Farm

abstract: In a sign of the difficulties facing the development of wind energy, the legendary Texas oilman T. Boone Pickens is suspending plans to build the world’s largest wind farm.
snippet: In a sign of the difficulties facing the development of wind energy, the legendary Texas oilman T. Boone Pickens is suspending plans to build the world’s largest wind farm.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of the difficulties facing the development of wind energy, T. Boone Pickens, the legendary Texas oilman, is suspending plans to build the world’s largest wind farm, The New York Times’s Kate Galbraith reports.

headline.main: Pickens Scales Back Ambitious Wind Farm
